message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $135. Would you be interested?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I can do $130 for you. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to meet you at $129, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. Would you be willing to meet me there?
